channel.title: [RuneSource] RunePast
channel.description:
This is The last Development I will do :) (i hope)
Okay lets start out with what this is. This is a Runescape Remake Pretty much from scratch, Using RuneSource.
Now The Development Team: This is the Firist time i had a Development Team This big
Flavius/Mezzyscape562(Isakilla) ( Some kid ) James/james4370 ( I dont know.. ) Luke/heatrn11 ( Coder / Developer ) Martijn (Bug Tester / Info ) Colin ( Advertiser / Irl Friend ) Kamran ( Helper / Noob...)
Green = 100% Complete Yellow = 50% Complete Orange = 25% Complete Red = Not Started
Now Lets Start With Skills
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat Flawless PvP Flawless PvN Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Every weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) Equipment requirements Degradable equipment Weapon poisoning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] Magic
Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Charge w/ godspells Iban blast/Slayer dart Weakening spells Teleblock/binding/freezing Every other spell including: B2b/B2p Charging orbs Alching/Superheat Enchanting jewelry
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] Ranged
Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] Prayer
All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] Mining
[color=green]Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined[/color] Mining gems at shilo village Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] Smithing
All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Ring of forging Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img]Fishing
All fish can be caught Big net fishing Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan) Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations Fishing Platform
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img]Cooking
Meats Flour collecting Bread Pies Stews Pizzas Cakes Wine Hot drinks Potatoes Diary Brew making Cooking gauntlets Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img]Woodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees [color=orange]Correct hatchet finding[/color] [color=green]Correct hatchet animations[/color] [color=green]All trees cut-able[/color] [color=yellow]Correct fell chance algorithms[/color] Birds nest falling out
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Firelighters Pyre log firemaking mort'ton temple(making sacred oil) Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses) All lighting sources Colored fires "Backward" firelighting Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] Agility
Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses Run energy affected(weight + level) Force movement mask Correct animations used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4jFcc.gif[/img]Herblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Coconut making Item grinding(pestle use) Poisoning weapons(all types) Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img]Thieving
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Doors lockpicking and chests Correct animations and graphics used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img]Crafting
Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets and necklaces [color=orange]Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide[/color] [color=yellow]Crafting normal, hard, snakeskin, and dragon hide[/color] Crafting snakeskin Spinning wool and flax Making pottery Attaching studs
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img]RuneCrafting
Use of the Abyss Rock mining Tendrils chopping Boil burning Eyes distracting Gap crossing Passage Skulled when entering Prayer drained to 0 Dark mage repairing pouches
All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting Combining runes and their uses Mist runes Dust runes Mud runes Smoke runes Steam runes Lava runes Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img]Fletching
[color=green]All main logs can be fletched[/color] [color=yellow]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/color] [color=]Can string bows Can make bolt-tips Darts[/color] Brutal arrows making [color=yellow]Bow stringing Can make arrows[/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] Slayer
All slayer masters Every monsters added for every tasks Burthorpe tasks Canifis tasks Edgeville tasks Lost city tasks Shilo village tasks Tips on killing monsters 'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay Slayer shops All slayer masters working Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task All equipment working Item that finishes off some monsters Equipment that are required to fight some monsters
Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre) Slayer gem working
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img] Farming
Allotments All vegetables working Correct crop timings
Flowers All flowers and their effects working Correct flower timings
Herbs All herbs working Correct herbs timings
Hops All hops working Correct hops timings
Fruit Trees All fruit trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct fruit tree growth timings
Trees All trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct tree growth timings
Gardeners Watch over crops working Correct payments per type of crop
Compost Bin Supercompost making Compost making
Bushes berries regrowing after being picked Correct bush timings All bushes working
Tool Leprechaun Store items working Swaps noted items
All farming patches working Correct disease chance algorithm Special plants Spirit trees teleport to tree gnome Calquat trees Belladona trees Cactus trees
All tools working Magic secateurs
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img]Minigames
Duel Arena Castle Wars Fight Caves Fight Pits Barrows Pest Control Fishing Trawler Gnome Ball Bar crawl Blast Furnace Champion's Challenge Chompy hunting Games room Jungle Clean Up Pet Care(You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) Rogue Trader Rogue's Den Splitbark Armour Temple Trekking Tzhaar Caves Magic Training Arena
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] Music / Sounds
Get music/sound packets Get music/sound playing All areas have music All sounds added
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests
Quest Handler Cook's Assistant Desert Treasure Recipie for Disaster Dwarf Cannon ....
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] Random Events
Genie Drunken dwarf Ent tree Explosive mining rocks Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img]Miscellaneous Multiple worlds support Ground items (items wait for 60 seconds before becoming public, then disappear after an additional 150 seconds. Untradable items disappear after 180 seconds from being dropped) Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) Skill interfaces Repairing broken/degraded items Item weight Treasure trails Clue scroll system Kill some monster to get the key for a chest/drawers (level3 clues) Puzzles Simple Clues Puzzle : hover your mouse on the hint icon to get a hint Anagram Scrolls Challenge Scrolls Cryptics Coordinate(need sextant, chart, and watch to dig) Speak to clues key to open drawers and chests saradomin/zamorak fight on level 3 clues Digging clues Map Scrolls Search Scrolls Mage book making(torn pages) Every clue level reward(25+ rewards) Npcs dropping clue scrolls
X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) All ways of travelling(teleports, jewelry, gnome glider, ships, canoe) Global item drops (need to finish adding drops) Pets Pathfinding for walking Complete clipping map (walls and tiles) - Supports clipping variation Party rooms
Pictures ( Taken by me ):
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3js8v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OdW5j.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/t5LK1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uUukc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MZg52.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Untitled-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Teleporting.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/hansdia3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/hansdia2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Hansdia.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/fletching.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/firemaking.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NGt9u.png[/img]
will Try to Update this Weekly and not quit :)
